title: Blibli seeks to raise $530 million on IDX, but faces bleak share performance
description: The listing will be the Indonesian bourse’s third largest, after those of Bukalapak and GoTo. But Blibli may not enjoy the same “hype” as its predecessors, given the instability of tech sector share prices, experts opined. Both firms have seen their share prices drop significantly since IPO.
author: Sara Velezmoro
